      • executeQueries

        public java.lang.Object[] executeQueries(java.lang.String[] qarr)
                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Executes queries corresponding to the keys passed using array

        String[] arr = {"1", "2", "3"};
        new QueryTestUtils().executeQueries(arr);

        Parameters:
        qarr - Array of keys, queries in the values mapped are executed
        Returns:
        Object array containing SelectResults
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
